name: Failure to comply with summons or citation
text: [§291C-225]  Failure to comply with summons or citation.  If a violator of this part does not return an answer in response to a summons or citation within a period of fourteen days upon receipt of the summons or citation, the traffic violations bureau shall issue to the registered owner of the vehicle a penal summons ordering the registered owner's appearance in court. [L 1993, c 224, pt of §1]
